meta.description: Language labels for the lowevel module of "clicleaner"

languageKey.label: Cli Cleaner -- clean up cache ans indexed_search index
If you need to clear TYPO3 cache or indexed_search index from commandline, use this script.
Clear page content cache
Clear all caches
Clear index_search index tables
Affected tables:
Here is a list of all tables that could be cleaned up, along with the number of records that could be deleted.
Table %1$s: %2$d records to delete
Table %s: no records to delete
No records to delete!
%d records deleted.
Cleaning records for table "%s"
